info.title: QuickCredit
info.description: A collection on quickcredit node express API

post.description: Create new user by passing in (firstname, lastname, email, homeAddress, workAddress, pin), content-type should be (x-www-form-urlencoded)
Sign in a a valid user by passing valid credentials into the request body, content-type should be (x-www-form-urlencoded).

Create loan application, user(email) is obtained from the authorization header value(token) by decodeing the header value. Pass Tenor(Interger <= 12) and Loan amount(Float <= Loan Type maximum amount)

get.description: Get Loan application by ID passing it as a parameter in the URL

patch.description:
verifys a loan, put the verify status into the request body.
NB: Request body must be an encoded URL search param forexample: new URLSearchParam({ 'status': 'verified' }).
Verify user by email ID, pasing it as a parameter in the URL

post.description:
Post loan repayment by passing loan ID as a URL param.
NB. ADMIN can use same endpoint to make a loan repayment transaction in favor of a user,  by passing in email ID of a user in the URL as param

get.summary: GET A SPECIFIC LOAN REPAYMENT DATA
get.description: Get Loan Repayment data by Id
Retrieves all users stored in the database
